title: Peanut Butter
ingredients: OPTIONAL: For honey peanut butter, add 3 tbsp honey and 2tbsp peanut or vegetable oil
OPTIONAL: For maple-pumpkin spice peanut butter, add 1/4 cup peanut or vegatble oil, 2 tbsp maple syprup, and 1 1/2 tsp pumpkin pie spice
directions: Mix in mixer for about 3 minutes, scraping along bottom
